statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeProductivity;
SELECT employee_id, task_name FROM EmployeeProductivity WHERE time_spent_minutes > 60;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM EmployeeProductivity ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProductivity WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT task_id, time_spent_minutes FROM EmployeeProductivity WHERE task_name LIKE 'database%';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProductivity WHERE time_spent_minutes > 60 ORDER BY task_name ASC
SELECT employee_id, task_id, task_name FROM EmployeeProductivity WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY time_spent_minutes DESC
SELECT task_name, SUM(time_spent_minutes) AS total_time_spent FROM EmployeeProductivity GROUP BY task_name HAVING total_time_spent > 200
SELECT AVG(time_spent_minutes) AS average_time_spent FROM EmployeeProductivity WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM EmployeeProductivity GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_tasks <= 5 ORDER BY total_tasks ASC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_name = 'Task 1';
SELECT task_name, task_description, hours_spent FROM tasks ORDER BY hours_spent DESC;
SELECT employee_name, total_hours_spent FROM employees WHERE tasks_completed > 5;
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN tasks ON employees.employee_id = tasks.assigned_to;
SELECT employee_name, tasks_completed FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE tasks_completed > 5;
SELECT employee_name, total_hours_spent FROM employees WHERE total_hours_spent < 100;
SELECT task_name, task_description, hours_spent FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, employee_name FROM tasks JOIN employees ON tasks.assigned_to = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE estimated_duration > 5 ORDER BY actual_duration DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, estimated_duration FROM tasks WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT productivity_id, date, task_id, hours_spent FROM productivity WHERE hours_spent < 8;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC, position ASC;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT task_name, actual_duration FROM tasks WHERE estimated_duration > 5 ORDER BY actual_duration DESC;
SELECT employees.name, tasks.task_name FROM employees JOIN tasks ON employees.employee_id = tasks.employee_id;
SELECT productivity_id, date, hours_spent FROM productivity WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT task_name, time_spent_minutes FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE time_spent_minutes > 30;
SELECT employee_name, task_name FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_tasks ON employees.employee_id = employee_tasks.employee_id INNER JOIN tasks ON employee_tasks.task_id = tasks.task_id;
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN employee_tasks ON employees.employee_id = employee_tasks.employee_id WHERE employees.department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, task_name FROM employees JOIN employee_tasks ON employees.employee_id = employee_tasks.employee_id JOIN tasks ON employee_tasks.task_id = tasks.task_id;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;

SELECT employee_name, task_name, time_spent_minutes FROM employees JOIN employee_tasks ON employees.employee_id = employee_tasks.employee_id JOIN tasks ON employee_tasks.task_id = tasks.task_id WHERE tasks.time_spent_minutes > 60;
SELECT department, COUNT(task_id) AS task_count FROM department_tasks GROUP BY department HAVING task_count > 2 ORDER BY task_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT employee_name, date, hours_spent FROM employees, time_entries WHERE employees.employee_id = time_entries.employee_id;
SELECT team_name FROM project_teams WHERE team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_assignments WHERE employee_id = 2);
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(task_description) > 50;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department IN ('IT', 'HR') ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, hours_spent FROM tasks JOIN time_entries ON tasks.task_id = time_entries.task_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, t.team_name FROM team_assignments ta JOIN employees e ON ta.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN project_teams t ON ta.team_id = t.team_id WHERE e.department = 'Finance';
